mapper.update:
update T_COMMON_SECTION
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tunnel_id = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_cable_number = #{totalCableNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
camera = #{camera,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_point = #{startPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_point = #{endPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_COMMON_SECTION set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tunnel_id = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_cable_number = #{totalCableNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, camera = #{camera,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_point = #{startPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_point = #{endPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select c.* from t_common_section a left join t_common_store b on a.store_id=b.id left join t_common_tunnel c on b.tunnel_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
